thread.title: High Tide podcast: Previewing deciding factors and offering a prediction
thread.title_full: High Tide podcast: Previewing deciding factors and offering a prediction

author: John Talty | jtalty@al.com
title: High Tide podcast: Previewing deciding factors and offering a prediction
text:
Comments 
We are finally only a day away from the biggest Southeastern Conference game of this early season. 
No. 13 Alabama arrives in Athens needing a win to keep its playoff hopes alive. No. 8 Georgia needs a win to legitimize its national championship pursuit and get a statement win from a lackluster schedule. You could argue there's a lot of pressure on both squads . 
In the latest episode of High Tide, Dawg Sports Radio's Dan Mathews join the show to preview the game and offer a prediction. AL.com's John Talty will also offer betting advice -- watch the weather reports -- and talk about what's making him salty this week. 
Make sure to listen to the episode below and check out BamaSportsRadio.com and download the Bama Sports Radio app for more listening options.
